jalse.entities.methods

Class ScheduleForActorMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalse.entities.methods.ScheduleForActorMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityMethod

    public class ScheduleForActorMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityMethod
    This is used for mapping calls to ActionScheduler.scheduleForActor(Action, long, long, TimeUnit).
    See Also:
    ScheduleForActor, ScheduleForActorFunction
